item.title: Software Testing (Software QA) Course (November 2012)
item.description: ISTQB Foundation Level Software Testing training course. Evenings sessions. Software Testing (QA) course. Evenings from 6 pm to 9 pm, Tuesdays and Thursdays. 8 sessions. Final session is completing the ISTQB Software Testing Foundation Level Certification exam. Course starts Nov. 6, 2012.

item.title: Software Testing (Software QA) Course (October 2012)
item.description: ISTQB Foundation Level Software Testing training course. Evenings sessions. Software Testing (QA) course. Evenings from 6 pm to 9 pm, Tuesdays and Thursdays. 8 sessions. Final session is completing the ISTQB Software Testing Foundation Level Certification exam. Course starts Oct. 2, 2012.
